This folder contains two publicly available solvers which is possible to use to use with COMMIT:

* sbb
  D. Kim, S. Sra, and I. S. Dhillon
  "A non-monotonic method for large- scale non-negative least squares"
  Optim Methods Softw, pp. 1–28, 2012

* spgl1
  E. van den Berg and M. Friedlander
  "Probing the pareto frontier for basis pursuit solutions"
  SIAM J Sci Comput, vol. 31, pp. 890–912, 2008
